summary: This mod makes some changes on the blades armour.
descriptionHtml:
Hey folks,

after playing with my beloved blades armour, I got stuck on how it looks. You know it\'s quite a bit dirty, and the armour looks like it\'s 500 years old - what it really is. But I wanted to have a newer, sexier. Something that makes me proud of wearing it. So I decidet to refresh the colours of the armour. Pls don\'t forget, this is just the way I like it, and wanted to share it anyway. If you like it too, leave me a comment. I also really appreciate it if you have any suggestions so I can make it better.

If you want a specific armour recoloured, just leave me a mail.

-- Install Notes --

Extract the Data Folder into you Skyrim Folder. If asked, overwrite files.
author: Real_Mindmaster
